text: Thalassobacillus hwangdonensis is a Gram-positive, endospore-forming, rod- shaped and motile bacterium from the genus of Thalassobacillus which has been isolated from tidal flat from the Yellow Sea in Korea. ==References== ==External links== *Type strain of Thalassobacillus hwangdonensis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Bacillaceae Category:Bacteria described in 2010
title: Thalassobacillus hwangdonensis
